relevant_findings.cardiac_auscultation: Normal point of maximal impulse, regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, soft I/VI systolic murmur at left upper sternal border
relevant_findings.neurological_examination: Symmetrical weakness in a proximal distribution, more pronounced in lower extremities

vital_signs.pacemaker_threshold: Increased threshold of 2.0 V compared to 0.75 V 4 months prior

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Several episodes of failed right ventricular capture noted
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased threshold indicated a change in pacemaker function

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant variability of myofiber size and disturbed intermyofibrillar network found in muscle biopsy
